title: HPM 883: Advanced Quantitative Methods for Health policy and Management

yaml.title: HPM 883: Advanced Quantitative Methods for Health policy and Management

markdown.markdown:
This page contains the schedule, topics, content and assigments for the semester.

::: callout-tip

This schedule will be updated as the semester progresses.
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XpkFUr6AfkO-w0mqtXZbBUIA_lxVNsePaWCtRMDuE0U/edit?usp=sharing", sheet = "Schedule")
prepare_cutoff_date <- as.Date("2025-05-20")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| column: screen-inset-right
d |>
  filter(!is.na(session)) |>
  select(-dow, -admin_notes, -number, -session) |>
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(date),
    prepare = if_else(date > prepare_cutoff_date, "*To be posted*", prepare)
    ) |>
  relocate(due, .after = materials) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_date(date, date_style = 31) |>
  sub_missing(
    columns = c(week, prepare, topic, materials, due), 
    missing_text = ""
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(week)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "right", 
    columns = c(date)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(topic, prepare, materials, due)
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(
      color = "#b4b4b4"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(prepare),
      rows = prepare == "*To be posted*"
    )
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(
      color = "#b4b4b4"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(materials),
      rows = materials == "*To be posted*"
    )
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(date, topic, prepare, materials)
    )
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "top",
      color = "black",
      weight = px(2),
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = everything(),
      rows = str_detect(topic, "[Ll]ab|Project milestone|Final$")
    )
  ) |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(topic, prepare, materials, due)
  ) |>
  tab_options(table.width = pct(100)) |>
  cols_width(
    week ~ pct(2),
    date ~ pct(10), 
    prepare ~ pct(25),
    topic ~ pct(27),
    materials ~ pct(18),
    due ~ pct(18)
  ) |>
  cols_label_with(fn = function(x) {
      janitor::make_clean_names(x, case = "title") |>
        toupper() |>
        stringr::str_replace_all("^|$", "**") |>
        md()
    }) |>
  tab_options(table.font.size = 13) |>
  opt_row_striping()
```
